htmlPage.title: Dietitians
htmlPage.body:
Dietitian & Nutrition Locum Job Agency

PJ Locums Ltd is a privately owned recruitment agency placing overseas personnel in the NHS, allied health and social care sectors. All Recruitment agencies can offer you a job, but PJ Locums are the agency that puts you first, listens to your needs and finds you the job that is right for you.

If you meet the below requirements for UK Dietitian & Nutrition jobs, register with PJ Locums to generate your CV. If successful, we will contact you to arrange an appointment on arrival in the UK.

UK Grades are:

Basic - 6 months post qualifying experience

Senior II - 2 years post qualifying experience

Senior I - 4 years post qualifying experience

Locum Registration Requirements for all Jobs:

  • CV
  • Two most recent professional references
  • Passport details page
  • Visa
  • Drivers License
  • National police clearance
  • CRB
  • Professional UK registration certificates
  • Degree
  • Proof of additional training/career professional development
  • Passport Photo
  • Fit to work certificate from your GP
  • Immunisations Certificates for: Rubella, TB, Polio, Varicella

Locum Areas of Speciality for Dietitians:

  • Care of the elderly
  • General dietetics
  • Paediatrics
  • Community/GP Clinics
  • Renal
  • Medical/Surgical
  • Nutrition Support
The Health Professions Council
184 Kennington Park Rd
London, SE11 4BU 		Tel: 020 7582 0866
Fax: 020 7820 9684
